title: Assessing Children's Development and Environments
description: Current developmental and environmental assessments used in childcare and educational settings and in research. Practice using, creating, and evaluating child assessments. 3 lectures, 1 activity. Crosslisted as CD/PSYÂ 431.
prerequisites: CD 304 and CD 305 or two of the following: PSY 419, PSY 420, PSY 421; and CD 329 or PSY 329
